name: Dunk Shot Basket
description:
Grab a ball to start dunking! Fast paced, Hit the hoop，score as many point as you can in the limit time!
Addictive sport game! Can`t stop playing to grow your power and style to be the next All Star!
Features:
-- Vibrant graphics & effects, with great gameplay!
-- Free game, PK opponent around the world!
-- 3 modes, Multiple balls designed for you !
-- Easy to control, challenge the highest scores!
-- Hit the hoop, the time will reset!

Tap the ball, Precise dunk shot the ball to find more different interesting gameplay with turning the ball ablaze! Dunk to have endless fun for FREE!
Rise up NOW! Jump, Shot, Smash, Hit! It`s time to dunk!!!
